description: Updates the specified environment profile in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which an environment profile is to be updated.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the environment profile that is to be updated.

parameters.name: userParameters
parameters.description: The user parameters to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironmentProfile action. (dict) --- The parameter details of an evironment profile. name (string) --- The name of an environment profile parameter. value (string) --- The value of an environment profile parameter.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of an environment profile parameter.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value of an environment profile parameter.

nested_items.name: awsAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account in which a specified environment profile is to be udpated.

nested_items.name: awsAccountRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region in which a specified environment profile is to be updated.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the environment profile was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the environment profile.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironmentProfile action.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the environment profile is to be updated.

nested_items.name: environmentBlueprintId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the blueprint of the environment profile that is to be updated.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the environment profile that is to be udpated.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironmentProfile action.

nested_items.name: projectId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the project of the environment profile that is to be updated.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the environment profile was updated.

nested_items.name: userParameters
nested_items.description: The user parameters to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironmentProfile action.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value of the parameter.

nested_items.name: fieldType
nested_items.description: The filed type of the parameter.

nested_items.name: isEditable
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the parameter is editable.

nested_items.name: isOptional
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the custom parameter is optional.

nested_items.name: keyName
nested_items.description: The key name of the parameter.
